description:
test_network_basic_ops fails with
testtools.matchers._impl.MismatchError: 0 != 1: Found multiple IPv4 addresses: []. Unable to determine which port to target.

This is because nova doesn't wait for Neutron to plug the vif.
title: test_network_basic_ops fail with libvirt+xen

comments.content:
test_network_basic_ops fails with
testtools.matchers._impl.MismatchError: 0 != 1: Found multiple IPv4 addresses: []. Unable to determine which port to target.

This is because nova doesn't wait for Neutron to plug the vif.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rossella-o

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Rossella Sblendido (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/268258
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: The change was abandoned.  The libvirt driver should be waiting for VIF plugged events, regardless of whether or not you're using xen or qemu/kvm.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
